headline: Lennox Calls on Communities to Nominate Local Heroes for the 2025 Feel The Love® Program
summary: Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leading provider of innovative home comfort solutions, announced that nominations are open for its Feel The Love program, sponsored by the LII Lennox Foundation. In partnership with its generous dealer network across the U.S. and Canada, Lennox will donate and install heating and cooling (HVAC) units for community heroes. Deserving individuals can be nominated until August 31 at FeelTheLove.com.
